Troubleshooting

If addon works, but dont automatically download files

By default extension downloads files automatically to a subfolder of the "Downloads" folder specified in the browser settings. Make sure you have specified the "Downloads" directory.
For Firefox - in Settings -> General -> "Save files to" radio button must be selected (more info)
For Chrome - Open

Download process video examples

Download images from Pinterest (Collect bookmarks from specifed folder)

Download images from Twitter (Collect "Media" section)

Download images from Pixiv (Collect "Bookmarks" example)
